text: Black Mama White Mama (also known as Women in Chains) is a 1973 American Filipino action movie directed by Eddie Romero. It is a remake of the 1958 movie The Defiant Ones. It stars Pam Grier, Sid Haig, Margaret Markov, Zaldy Zshornack, Eddie Gracia, Alona Alegre, Alfonso Carvajal. ==Other websites== * *Black Mama, White Mama at Turner Classic Movies * Category:1973 action movies Category:1973 LGBT movies Category:American action movies Category:American LGBT movies Category:Filipino movies Category:Movies directed by Eddie Romero Category:Movies set in the Philippines Category:Blaxploitation movies
title: Black Mama White Mama
